examSet.question: What is a computer algorithm?
examSet.options: A) step-by-step procedure for calculations B) a collection of data items stored in memory C) some crap D) more crap

examSet.question: What is a data structure?
examSet.options: A) some crap B) more crap C) step-by-step procedure for calculations D) a collection of data items stored in memory

examSet.question: Make something up!?
examSet.options: A) some crap B) more crap C) :D D) :)

examSet.question: Make something up!?
examSet.options:
A) Different kinds of data structures are suited to different kinds of applications, and some are highly specialized to specific tasks. For example, B-trees are particularly well-suited for implementation of databases, while compiler implementations usually use hash tables to look up identifiers.
B) The Java collections framework (JCF) is a set of classes and interfaces that implement commonly reusable collection data structures. JCF is a part of SDK. Main interfaces JCF provides are: list, stack, queue, set, map.
C) Different kinds of data structures are suited to different kinds of applications, and some are highly specialized to specific tasks. For example, B-trees are particularly well-suited for implementation of databases, while compiler implementations usually use hash tables to look up identifiers.
D) The Java collections framework (JCF) is a set of classes and interfaces that implement commonly reusable collection data structures. JCF is a part of SDK. Main interfaces JCF provides are: list, stack, queue, set, map.
